mapper.sql: ID, FAMILY_NUMBER, FAMILY_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANGE_REASON, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, OWNER_CERTIFICATE_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into t_resident_change (FAMILY_NUMBER, FAMILY_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANGE_REASON, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, OWNER_CERTIFICATE_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG ) values (#{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerCertificateImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0 )
mapper.select: select FAMILY_NUMBER,FAMILY_NAME,CHANGE_REASON,ID_CARD from t_resident_change where ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
